content: Here’s the thing. I’m not using my FitBit to lose weight. I’m using it as a step counter and activity tracker. I started trying to walk more this summer, and I dislike traditional step counters that clip to the waistband. I much prefer one that I can wear on my wrist. Now I can see how many steps I make in a day and how many active minutes I have per day. Then I can choose to make more if I want to.
